Content_FullWidth.Name: Diamond Parking Service
Content_FullWidth.Title: Diamond Parking Service
Content_FullWidth.BodyCopy:
The Church Travel Department has established an agreement with Diamond Parking located at 1969 W North Temple (Lot B) near the Salt Lake Airport. The following information gives available services and pricing.

How to Use Diamond Parking Service:
  1. Click here to print a copy of the coupon
  2. Arrive at 1969 W North Temple (Lot B) a comfortable 15 minutes before you wish to be at the airport
  3. For the lowest rates, follow the self-park signs or park under the canopy for valet open or covered parking, respectively
  4. Shuttles deliver you to the airport in just 6 minutes
  5. When returning home from your trip, call Diamond Parking on the courtesy phone in the baggage claim area and they will send a shuttle to pick you up
  6. The shuttle will return to the lot and drop you off at your vehicle. Valet customers will be dropped off first
  7. Diamond Parking offers 24-hour shuttle service, a free car wash, free newspapers (while they last), free bottled water, and baggage assistance
  8. A coupon is required for this offer. The coupon expiration date is 12/31/2012
To contact Diamond Parking:

1969 W North Temple (Lot B)
Salt Lake City, UT 84116
Tel: 801-478-0900
E-mail: slcpj@diamondparking.com
www.diamondSLC.com
